column1: '''Graham Faulkner''' (1947) is a former British actor. He retired from acting years ago, and before that played mostly minor roles. He voiced [[Déagol]], [[Bill Ferny]] and an [[Orcs
column2: Orc]] Captain in  the [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)
column3: 1981 radio series of ''The Lord of the Rings]]''.
